definitions.text: devote oneself to a special area of work
examples: This baker specializes in French bread
Could you please specify your criticism of my paper?
this kind of beak has become specialized in certain Galapagos finches

definitions.text: become more focus on an area of activity or field of study
examples: She specializes in Near Eastern history

definitions.text: evolve so as to lead to a new species or develop in a way most suited to the environment
